name: Ninety One (group)
description: '''Ninety One''' or '''91''' ({{langx|kk|Тоқсан бір}}, ''Toqsan bır'', Korean : 나인티원) is a [[Kazakhstan|Kazakh]] [[boy group]] formed by [[Juz Entertainment|JUZ Entertainment]] in 2015.  The band consists of four members: Alem, Ace, Zaq, and Bala. Once a five-member group, former member A.Z. left in 2020. Ninety One is the pioneer act of a new musical genre called [[Q-pop]] ''(Qazaq-pop)'' which could be called a synthesis of Western and Asian [[pop music]]. The group was produced by Yerbolat Bedelkhan, a member of the Kazakh music unit "Orda".
